tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE creatives_and_ad_placements (
  creative_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  creative_name TEXT,
  ad_placement_id UUID,
  ad_unit_id UUID,
  bid_amount DOUBLE PRECISION
)

CREATE TABLE ad_placements (
    placement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    placement_name VARCHAR(255),
    placement_type VARCHAR(50),
    ad_format VARCHAR(50),
    bid_amount DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE creatives (
    creative_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    creative_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    ad_placement_id INT NOT NULL,
    creative_type VARCHAR(50),
    creative_size VARCHAR(20),
    created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE ad_placements (
    ad_placement_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    placement_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    targeting_criteria TEXT,
    ad_format VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    cost_per_click DECIMAL(10, 2),
    created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE ad_delivery (
    delivery_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    ad_placement_id INT NOT NULL,
    creative_id INT NOT NULL,
    delivery_date DATE,
    impressions INT,
    clicks INT,
    conversions INT,
    delivery_status VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE ad_analytics (
    analytics_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    ad_placement_id INT,
    num_impressions INT,
    num_clicks INT,
    conversion_rate FLOAT
);
